{{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = Desert Stars (Earth-616) from Avengers The Initiative Vol 1 16 0001.jpg | ImageSize = 250 | Name = Desert Stars | Aliases = [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]] [[Initiative]], [[Avengers]]{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #16}} | Status = Active | Identity = Public | Reality = 616 | BaseOfOperations = [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]] | Leaders = Formerly [[Matthew Hawk (Earth-616)|Two-Gun Kid]] | CurrentMembers = [[John Hashimoto (Earth-616)|Johnny Cool]], [[Edward Black Wolf (Earth-616)|Supermax]] | FormerMembers = [[Matthew Liebowicz (Earth-616)|Two-Gun Kid]], [[Melati Kusuma (Earth-616)|Komodo]], [[Blacksmith (Earth-616)|Blacksmith]] | Allies = [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|Initiative]]; [[Skrull Kill Krew (Earth-616)|Skrull Kill Krew]] | Enemies = [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrulls]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Dan Slott; Christos N. Gage; Stefano Caselli | First = Avengers: The Initiative Vol 1 12 | HistoryText = The Arizona team was from the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]]. As the team worked to help civilians during the [[Secret Invasion]], [[Charles Chandler (Earth-616)|3-D Man]] and the [[Skrull Kill Krew (Earth-616)|Skrull Kill Krew]] attacked. They reveal Desert Stars' member, the [[Blacksmith (Earth-616)|Blacksmith]], to be a [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]].{{r|Avengers: The Initiative Vol 1 16}} [[File:Desert Stars (Earth-616) from Avengers The Initiative Vol 1 16 0002.png|left|thumb]] Blacksmith fought the Stars and the Kill Krew. The Skrull took down most of the team during the battle and sliced off one of [[Melati Kusuma (Earth-616)|Komodo]]'s arms with its shield. The Skrull was finally taken down with a laser blast which went right through Komodo and into Blacksmith. Komodo healed quickly because of her lizard regenerative powers. The rest of the Stars were all injured, but the whole team survived. Before dying, the Skrull posing as Blacksmith stated that there was a Skrull infiltrator in every Initiative team. Komodo left to help 3-D Man and the Skrull Kill Krew find the Skrulls who have infiltrated the other Initiative teams.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative Vol 1 16}} [[File:Desert Stars (Earth-616) from Avengers The Initiative Vol 1 16 0001.png|right|thumb]] ==Desert Stars== * [[Matthew Liebowicz (Earth-616)|Two-Gun Kid]] - (Matthew Hawks), was appointed team leader. * [[Melati Kusuma (Earth-616)|Komodo]] - (Melati Kusuma) is a former graduate student of [[Curtis Connors (Earth-616)|Dr. Curt Connors (aka the Lizard)]]. She uses Connors' regenerative lizard serum to modify her own DNA . Connors later registered her for the Initiative and she was sent to Camp Hammond to be trained. Komodo was later appointed to the Initiative team for Arizona the Desert Star. * [[John Hashimoto (Earth-616)|Johnny Cool]] - (John Hashimoto) has the ability of cryokenisis and can emit freeze blasts. Johnny Cool is injured when Blacksmith is revealed to be a Skrull. * [[Edward Black Wolf (Earth-616)|Supermax]] - (Edward Black Wolf) * [[Blacksmith (Skrull) (Earth-616)|Blacksmith (Skrull)]] - (Jerry), was revealed to be a [[Skrull]] infiltrator. | Equipment = | Transportation = [[Sky-Cycle]] | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
